title: Secluded China Mountain Luxury with Indoor Pool, Spa and Onsite Dining
description:
Embrace the natural beauty of China's Jilin Province with a decadent stay at this five-star hideaway, nestled in the mountain slopes of Changbaishan Wanda International Resort. Enjoy seamless access to snow trails in winter and awe-inspiring forest landscapes during the warmer months. Delight in all-day dining at The Living Room, where a selection of international dishes await. Stay active at the fitness centre or unwind with a refreshing swim in the indoor heated pool.

Relax in your elegantly designed room, featuring plush bedding and modern amenities, or indulge in rejuvenating ancient Chinese therapies at the tranquil onsite spa. Venture beyond the resort to explore the area's rich cultural heritage and breathtaking natural splendour, ensuring a memorable and enriching escape.
offer_address: No.236 Guanmian Street, South Area of Changbaishan International Tourism Holiday Zone, Fusong County 134504, China
